remixlab.bias.event

Class MotionShortcut

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.core.Shortcut
      • remixlab.bias.event.MotionShortcut
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable

    public final class MotionShortcut
extends Shortcut
implements Copyable
    This class represents MotionEvent shortcuts.

    Button shortcuts can be of one of two forms: 1. Buttons (e.g., 'LEFT' , or even 'B_NOBUTTON'); 2. Button + modifier key combinations (e.g., 'RIGHT' + 'CTRL').

    Note that the shortcut may be empty: the no-button (B_NOBUTTON) and no-modifier-mask (B_NOMODIFIER_MASK) combo may also defined a shortcut. Empty shortcuts may bind button-less motion interactions (e.g., mouse move without any button pressed).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MotionShortcut()
      Constructs an "empty" shortcut by conveniently calling this(B_NOMODIFIER_MASK, B_NOBUTTON);
      MotionShortcut(int id)
      Defines a shortcut from the given button.
      MotionShortcut(int m, int id)
      Defines a shortcut from the given modifier mask and button combination.
